query.statement: UPDATE SAPHEE.ZCST121 SET CS121_NAM=#NAM#,CS121_SPT=#SPT#,CS121_JUC=#JUC#,CS121_ZIB=REPLACE(CAST(#ZIB# AS VARCHAR(7)),'-',''),CS121_P1B=#P1B# ,CS121_P2B=#P2B#,CS121_ZIE=REPLACE(CAST(#ZIE# AS VARCHAR(7)),'-',''),CS121_P1E=#P1E#,CS121_P2E=#P2E#,EGNAME=#EGNAME#,EPNAME=#EPNAME#,CS121_GSH=#GSH#,CS121_CDP=#CDP#,CS121_TEA=#TEA#,CS121_GYA=#GYA# ,CS121_SJU=#SJU# ,CS121_STR=#STR#,CS121_BGB=#BGB#,CS121_BHB=#BHB#,CS121_RIV=#RIV# ,CS121_RDT=#RDT#,CS121_JZR=#JZR#,CS121_SZR=#SZR#,CS121_CHR=#CHR#,CS121_RES=#RES# ,CS121_TEB=#TEB#,CS121_SMS = CASE WHEN #CHK_SMS# = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE '' END ,CS121_GYB=#GYB#,CS121_ZIC=REPLACE(CAST(#ZIC# AS VARCHAR(7)),'-',''),CS121_P1C=#P1C#,CS121_P2C=#P2C# ,CS121_TEC=#TEC#,CS121_GYC=#GYC#,CS121_RNM=#RNM#,CS121_ZID=REPLACE(CAST(#ZID# AS VARCHAR(7)),'-',''),CS121_P1D=#P1D# ,CS121_P2D=#P2D#,CS121_RN2=#RN2#,CS121_TED=#TED#,CS121_GYD=#GYD#,CS121_JSH=#JSH# ,CS121_EM1=#EM1#,CS121_EM2=#EM2#,CS121_CH2=#CH2#,CS121_TE2=#TE2#,CS121_GY2=#GY2# ,CS121_CH3=#CH3#,CS121_EM3=#EM3#,CS121_SM3=CASE WHEN #CHK_SM3# = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE '' END,CS121_TE3=#TE3#,CS121_GY3=#GY3# ,CS121_SDT=SUBSTR(SAPHEE.TO_DATETIME(),1,8),CS121_SDJ=#G_USER_ID# ,CS121_GBN=#GBN#,CS121_SLA=#SLA#,CS121_TMK=#TMK#,CS121_RSN=CASE CAST(#RSN# AS VARCHAR(1)) WHEN 'N' THEN '1' ELSE '2' END ,CS121_JNO=#JNO#,CS121_CAR=#CAR#,CS121_TE4=#TE4#,CS121_TE5=#TE5#,ZTERM=#ZTERM# ,CS121_DZIB=REPLACE(CAST(#DZIB# AS VARCHAR(7)),'-',''),CS121_DP1B=#DP1B#,CS121_DP2B=#DP2B# ,CS121_DZIE=REPLACE(CAST(#DZIE# AS VARCHAR(7)),'-',''),CS121_DP1E=#DP1E#,CS121_DP2E=#DP2E# ,CS121_NZIB=#NZIB# ,CS121_MEMO=#MEMO# WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS121_UPN = #UPN# AND CS121_CST = #CST#
